purpose: The email serves to share the call for papers for accepted workshops at the ACM/IEEE 28th International Conference on Model Driven Engineering Languages and Systems (MODELS 2025).
evidence_sentences: MODELS 2025 will host a number of workshops during the three days before the main conference.

The workshops will provide a collaborative forum for a group of typically 15 to 30 participants to exchange recent and/or preliminary results, conduct intensive discussions on a particular topic, or coordinate efforts between representatives of a technical community.
A list of the accepted workshops is available below, with links to workshop websites.
